headline: Renovations, Coffee and a ‘Focus Hangover’
abstract: The mandolin player recently moved his radio show to New York.
lead_paragraph: For a while, Chris Thile spent his weekends between two cities. After hosting “Live from Here” (formerly “A Prairie Home Companion”) in St. Paul, Minn., on Saturday nights, he would fly home to Brooklyn early the next morning. “Sundays were sacred,” he said. “But they didn’t start until I got home from J.F.K. or LaGuardia.”
